text: United Arab Emirates have been in seven Summer Olympic Games. They made their debut in the Winter Olympics in 2026. The United Arab Emirates National Olympic Committee was formed in 1979. They were recognized by the IOC in 1980. == List of medalists == Medal Name Games Sport Event Ahmed Al Maktoum 2004 Athens Shooting at the Olympics Men's Double Trap ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== ==Other websites== * United Arab Emirates profile at London2012.com Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:Sport in the United Arab Emirates
title: United Arab Emirates at the Olympics
